pages.text: The need to find the ancient marble temples for your Astral Magicks can be daunting at best, especially when considering the risks of traversing the Aether. However, crafting a Sextant will help with the search, guiding you to such structures with the stars above.

pages.heading: Sextant
pages.description: Hold $(k:sneak) to free the cursor and drag structure icons to stars
